Beachcomber/Smokescreen/Ramhorn/Manterror:



Beachcomber and Smokescreen stopped, optics "wide open" as Iron Raptor showed 
a lot of courage by approaching the 50 ft high robot.  "Slag, she should be 
leading..." Beachcomber said slowly.

"Y...yeah." Smokescreen got out, knowing he probably wouldn't have done what 
Iron Raptor had done, offering to take full responsiblity for others.  An 
amazing display.  

===

Manterror saw Ramhorn, with his holographic "decorations" up.  "Oh, Double 
Punch reprogrammed you already, eh?"

"Yes..." Ramhorn said slowly, turning to Manterror.  "I wish to test out my 
new beast mode, care to help?"

"Sure." Manterror said, leading the way as he and Ramhorn left the Predacon 
base.  After getting 80 ft away, Ramhorn transformed to his beast mode, which 
had a Maximal symbol.

"What the..." Manterror let out a scream as Ramhorn's horn stabbed into his 
gut, pulling out quickly as Ramhorn charged off towards the Ark, though in 
pain.
